batonPass.name: Baton Pass
batonPass.description: Pass turn to another after 1 More, increasing their attack and recovery.

shadowTalk.name: {0} Talk
shadowTalk.description: Chance to step in and save a failed shadow negotiation.

followUp.description: Chance to follow up after Joker's attack.

harisenRecovery.name: Harisen Recovery
harisenRecovery.description: Chance to remove status ailments from party members when in the party.

endure.name: Endure
endure.description: Chance to survive an attack that would otherwise kill.

protect.name: Protect
protect.description: Will take a blow that would otherwise kill Joker.

crocodileTears.name: Crocodile Tears
crocodileTears.description: Chance to further lower demands during shadow negotiation.
